title: Can't update?
body: So I've already patched 6.20, I played yesterday but now it's making me do a small patch again. It's jumping to 33% but then I get a message saying  Unspecified Error Occurred. Please check the logs for more information. I've tried closing the client but I'm not sure what to do.

replies.body: There were issues for some players being unable to patch, but everything should be fine now!  Make sure to bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for updates on server problems.  Everything should be okay now!

Me to i updated to 6.20 didn't play for 2 day then a smaller patch update wont let me run the game stop at 0 file scanned 33 percernt then say unspecific error retry and check logs i have uninstalled 3 time and deleted the riot files and still nothing hope it get fix soon.
I went to the Riot Patching Issues page and followed their instructions on how to force a re-patch, it's patching now but here's to hoping it doesn't get stuck at 33
